title: FR: More generic vault connector
author: bendem
body_snippet:
I saw that mRemoteNG supports vault connector for a single secret server. Most applications nowadays provide a more generic protocol allowing users to write tooling decoupled from the application, opening a path to integration with any password storage with minimal glue code.


## Expected Behavior

mRemoteNG defines a protocol, either a script must take parameter X and Y and return a json blob of schema Z, or a webserver must respond to GET request X with parameters Y and respond with a pl...

comments.author: robertpopa22
comments.snippet:
Triage refresh (P4 version-label debt): this issue is tagged with legacy version labels. Please retest on the latest build (fork v1.79.x or upstream dev), then share reproducible steps and expected vs actual behavior. If still valid, keep open and relabel to current triage scope (for example Need 2 check). If fixed, close with resolution.

Current legacy version labels: 1.78.*
